playful.translation[0].definitions[0].de: very active, happy, and wanting to have fun
playful.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Babies are playful and alert when they first wake up.
playful.translation[0].definitions[1].de: intended to be fun rather than serious, or showing that you are having fun
playful.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: a playful kiss on the cheek
